description: High-level system architecture overview documenting the pattern recognition pipeline, core components, and their interactions for Hong Kong stock analysis
Comprehensive documentation of pattern data structures, feature sets, and label classifications including the 18 technical features across 4 categories and their relationships
Detailed documentation of core pattern recognition algorithms including trend analysis, support break detection, correction phase analysis, and technical indicator calculations
Documentation of the data flow between components from initial data collection through feature extraction, pattern labeling, model training and evaluation
Specialized documentation of Hong Kong market-specific business rules, validation requirements, and trading pattern criteria implemented throughout the system
